name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SL Highlight and Copy Data Model IDs

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlights objects with data-model-id and displays their ID. Click to copy. Created by ReviewMyElearning to help course developers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily Find and Copy Storyline [data-model-id]s with a Simple Click!

In Articulate Storyline courses, implementing custom JavaScript on slide elements often requires locating the element’s [data-model-id]. Previously, finding these IDs involved either adding custom code to your course or using the browser inspector to manually search for them—both time-consuming and cumbersome.

Created by the team at ReviewMyElearning.com, this Chrome Extension allows you to instantly view all [data-model-id]s on the slide with a single click. Simply click on any element to automatically copy its ID to your clipboard—no more digging through code or relying on alt text workarounds.

Our goal is to help developers create better eLearning courses faster and with fewer headaches. Be sure to check out our full application at ReviewMyElearning.com to streamline your course development and review process even further!
